Clients

Class LoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Clients.LoginManager

  • public class LoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    class responsible to return a client facade of type relevant to use logging in.
    See Also:
    ClientFacade

      • getInstance

      • login

        public ClientFacade login(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          ClientType clientType)
        takes the input email\password and pass and tries to use it to login with the apporpriate client type. if successful, returns a ClientFacade of the type relevant to the user.
        Parameters:
        email - mail used to login
        password - password used to login
        clientType - the type of client trying to login and the facade to be returned if successful.
        Throws:
        wrong - mail/password!
        See Also:
        administratorFacade, customerFacade, adminFacade
